# Example Data 

## Survival on the Titanic
```{r titanic-1}
titanic <- as.data.frame(Titanic)

library(ggmosaic)
ggplot(data = titanic) + 
  geom_mosaic(aes(weight = Freq, fill = Survived, vars = interaction(Class, Sex), group = 1))
```
